Description.Text: Best Western Hotel Weisses Lamm is a classic 3-star superior property offering cosy accommodation in northwest Wuerzburg. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, onsite dining and a good location near Veitshoechheim train station. Wuerzburg, situated equidistant between Frankfurt and Nuremburg is a medium-sized city boasting one of the finest palaces in Europe, numerous examples of Baroque art and the Marienberg Fortress. Heavily bombed in 1945, much of the city has been rebuilt and alongside its many restored original buildings, visitors will find many post-war modernist properties. Places of interest include the Wuerzburg Residence Palace and gardens. The hotel is housed in a classic mid-rise building with traditional Bavarian architecture. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Superior rooms are approximately 18sqm and decorated in a classic style with warm tones. Amenities include satellite TV, a mini-bar, safe, work desk and an en-suite bathroom. The hotel restaurant serves German specialities and international cuisine in a charming setting. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks at the bar. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
